messages.title: Rust decay calculator
messages.info1: Choose the materials to calculate the remaining time
messages.info5: Consider that the decay time goes from the outside in, the further you are from the TC the less time it will take to fall, so it is an approximate time

home.decay: You can insert the type of material and the remaining hp, it will give you a fairly approximate time of when the structure will decay.
home.raid: You can choose the type of structure and see how much it would cost depending on the weapon/explosive.
home.add-genes-message: Insert the genes you have collected.
home.target-message: The objective of your genetics, insert the one you prefer (the order does not matter) and the calculator will take care of getting as close as possible with the genetics you have offered.
home.available-genetics-message: The list of genes you have entered.
home.breeding-genetics-message: The genes that you have to mix to obtain the result indicated below, I recommend using as the recipient plant the one that contains the most G.
home.result-message: The result you will get, if you get more than one result it means that there are 50% probabilities in some columns.

crossbreeding.target-info: Enter the desired genetics for example YYYGGG (which is the same as YGYYGG, the order does not matter).
crossbreeding.result-info: The result you will get, if you get more than one result it means that there are 50% probabilities in some columns.

policy.text-privacy: We appreciate your interest in our web page dedicated to providing information about Rust. The privacy and security of your personal data are of the utmost importance to us. The following is our privacy policy, which describes how we collect, use and protect the information you provide to us while using our website.
policy.text-info: Our website is designed to provide information about Rust, and we do not require users to enter personal information to use our tools or access the information provided. However, we may collect non-personal and anonymous information automatically through technologies such as cookies and server logs. This data is used to improve the functionality and performance of our website, and cannot be used to identify you personally.
policy.text-use: The automatically collected non-personal information is used to improve your experience on our website, analyze trends and gather demographic data. We will not share this information with third parties without your explicit consent.
policy.text-security: We are committed to protecting the information we collect. We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
policy.text-external: Our website may contain links to external websites that are not under our control. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such websites. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of any website you access from our page.
policy.text-change: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes made will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to periodically review this policy to be aware of any changes.
policy.text-contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, or if you wish to exercise your rights in relation to your personal data, please contact us through the following email: alvarito19992009@hotmail.com. Thank you for trusting us and using our website to obtain information about the video game.

misc.radlaunch: Behind red keycard requires Rad suit and water
